reviewText: The video is part of the PBS kids curious george series, my kids finally have them all : ) These videos are great at encouraging imagination and logical thinking. I would buy them again, my 3 year old and 2 year old love GEORGE
my daughter loves this george dvd and i do too.  it has music and lots of counting.  we watch it over and over and never get tired of it.

Both my 4 & 1 year old kids love this video. Here are the specific episodes featured on this video (from the PBS series):

Curious George Beats the Band
Old Mc Georgie Had A Farm
Monkey Stagehand
THe Elephant Upstairs
Skunked
Color Me Monkey
Zeros to Donuts
Special Delivery Monkey

My 4-year-old preschooler has been a fan of Curious George since she was a toddler. We have most of the episodes and watch them over and over without ever getting tired of the curious little monkey and his antics. There are 8 episodes on this DVD - Curious George Beats the Band, Old McGeorgie had a Farm, Monkey Stagehand, The Elephant Upstairs, Skunked, Color Me Monkey, Zeros to Donuts, and Special Delivery Monkey.

There are also bonus features - George's Conductor Game, DVD-ROM features: Printable Coloring Pages and Dot-to-Dots. Total running time is 1 hr 48 mins, and it does come with the option of English subtitles.
My littel girl (3 years) has watched all of the dvd repeatedly.  She really does learn from them and loves to watch them.

Curious George is by far and away my 2 and 3 year olds favorite. We have the original Will Ferrel/ Drew Barrymore movie plus all the TV shows on DVD yet released and they absolutely love them. Cute and well written for a young audience, even grows on the parents. Treat your toddler to these gems and they will be hooked.
This is another GREAT Curious George DVD!  Highly recommend it for both entertainment and education!
my 2 yr old daughter loves curious george.this dvd she loves like all the rest.

I am disappointed that all but one or two of the episodes on this latest DVD are from the inferior second season.  Several of our favorite first season episodes, such as "Candy Counter", "Invisible Sound", and "Turbo Python 3000" are still not available on DVD.

For reference here is the full episode list:

- Curious George Beats the Band
- Old McGeorgie Had a Farm
- Monkey Stagehand
- The Elephant Upstairs
- Skunked
- Color Me Monkey
- Zeros to Donuts
- Special Delivery Monkey
Awesome
Fun. A lot of episodes on this DVD for a very cheap price.
My kids love curious George! This was a huge hit, with 2 elephant shows my 3 year old was in heaven.
Worked well, ans quick delivery, my son loved adding it to his collection.
2 year old grandson loves George, this held his interest and has watched many times.
GREAT
Curious George actually directed a band.  The band followed his lead.  Unbelievable that a monkey could do this!
You can never go wrong with a George DVD. No issues with disc.
good ole George

My children enjoy the Curious George episodes.
My son loves this show, he loves to pick from the selection. He would watch them everyday. He loves curious george.
Kids loves Curious George. he makes for kids fun and smile. kids enjoy learning  English very much. thank you George.
My grandson loves Curious George.  The stories are funny, heart warming - never any violence or bad language.  I highly recommend Curious George.

My 2 year old loves watching Curious George on pbs while at home.  We must have several dozen episodes recorded.  Now when we go on road trips, we are able to watch Curious George thanks to the dvds.  They are the same episodes you watch on tv. Each DVD contains 8 shows totaling over 90 minutes of pure entertainment for our child to watch.
This video is worth over and above what it was listed for. My son can not seem to stop watching this video.

My kids love Curious George and I love that they are educational.

They usually watch this series on PBS but it is nice to have them for car rides and hotel stays.
My kids (ages 2 & 4) and I really enjoy watching Curious George.  I think it is very educational and fun way to learn.
Curious George, who doesn't love this monkey. Rec'vd it really fast and in excellent condition. Plus my 2 year old son loves it. And he's learning and having fun. Thank you.
Very happy!
My son adores Curious Geourge and has even picked up a few of his cute little mannerisms. Love CG!

We love George morning, noon and night.
These DVDs are a must see everyday in our household. Also they are very educational.
All of our order was great--packaged so well and everything came through in tip-top shape.  Thanks much
We really love Curious George in our house, we have almost every movie and this one certainly doesn't disappoint.

My son loves curious George. He is addicted to his videos. Keeps him entertained while I make quick dinners. This dvd itself only has one episode about the band but he is still pleased with the product. So I'm happy!
